notes: 6 minutes were lost due to partial power failure. One over was reduced for the Bangladeshi innings with a revised target of 226 to win.

milestones.description: Minhajul Abedin and Mohammad Rafique's 57-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 2nd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 37 between Athar Ali Khan and Habibul Bashar
Naimur Rahman and Khaled Mahmud's 56-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 6th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 40 between Aminul Islam and Enamul Haque
Mohammad Rafique has become the top wicket-taker for BAN in ODIs with 13 wickets, going past Hasibul Hossain's 11
Aasif Karim has broken the record for most ducks (3) in ODIs for KENYA, going past Martin Suji's 2
Kenya's 28-run win against Bangladesh is the smallest margin of victory in terms of runs in ODIs, beating 73-run win against West Indies
Steve Tikolo has scored 4 fifty-plus scores in ODIs, the most for KENYA breaking Otieno's record
Aasif Karim has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (18) for KENYA, going past Chudasama
Enamul Haque has broken the record for most catches in an innings (3) in ODIs for BAN, going past Akram Khan's 2
